Why should we unban you?:you guys should unban me because i did nothihg wrong,it was a zombie freeday a guy had a gun and he ran past another prisoner and my bullet hit him by mistake and then i was banned.i said sorry.

sorry i couldn't get who banned me and time and date.
I'm the one who banned you and from what I saw, people were complaining about you freekilling.
i didn't freekill anyone i only killed them if they had a gun or keep trying to kill me.
Hmm well I can admit it was a bit harsh so I'm gonna lift it for now.
